title: Absolutely the best guacamole
ingredients: ['1 medium-ripe avocado, mashed', '1 tomato, finely chopped', '1 small red onion, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons soured cream', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '3 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground corriander', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'extra chives to garnish']
